info.description: Chiosco Il Tempio is a cozy green spot in Florence, open all year round and perfect at any time of day.
info.footer: A meeting place for those looking to relax and enjoy good company in the heart of Florence.
info.booking: To book tables for graduation parties or small events, call:

services.breakfast: ☕ Breakfast: coffee, cappuccinos, croissants, and sweet pastries.
services.lunch: 🍽️ Lunch: sandwiches, fresh pasta dishes, and salads.
services.aperitif: 🍹 Aperitifs & Cocktail Bar: drinks, wine, craft beers.
services.dinner: 🍕 Informal dinners: bring your own take-out and enjoy it at the kiosk.

seasons.jan_feb: ❄️ January – February: open only in good weather
seasons.mar_apr: 🌸 March – April: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM (closed in case of bad weather)
